Locale.Value:
- Added gray theme
- Added writing target function
- Added smart delete old backup function
- Automatic replacement rules can be imported and exported in batches
- Preferences can be imported and exported
- When the left column is arranged vertically, the height of each row can be adjusted
- You can right-click on the content of the memo, and formatting the content of the memo in the context menu
- The typing statistics become global, that is, the typing statistics of all libraries are merged
- Daily typing statistics can be exported as pictures for easy sharing
- Some minor bug fixes and experience details improvements
- Some copywriting and style tweaks

- 新增深灰主题
- 新增写作目标功能
- 新增智能删除老备份功能
- 自动替换规则可批量导入、导出
- 选项设置可导入、导出
- 左边栏纵向排列时，可调整各栏高度
- 可在备注内容上单击右键，对备注内容一键排版
- 码字统计变为全局，即合并所有文档库的码字统计
- 每日码字统计可生成便于分享的图片
- 一些小 bug 修复以及体验细节改进
- 一些文案以及样式调整
